meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Charlee Hutton Tom Nicoll Mark Born Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1586.

div.div:
Mark Born game 3.
Missing Final Jeopardy! responses.

td.p: Charlee Hutton, a contract administrator from Long Beach, California
Tom Nicoll, a police officer originally from Detroit, Michigan
Mark Born, an investment analyst from Los Angeles, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $44,399)

tr.td: 1990 EMMYS
LAW
IN THE DICTIONARY
USA
ART
NANCY REAGAN

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1990 this news network won its 1st news Emmy, for coverage of events in Tiananmen Sq.')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1990 this news network won its 1st news Emmy, for coverage of events in Tiananmen Sq.
